Latest Updates

1 November 2020
First-of-its-kind Book Dispenser at Lot One Shoppers’ Mall for patrons residing in Choa Chu Kang

Patrons residing in Choa Chu Kang now have another way to access books and materials they love! In a pilot initiative, we have introduced our first-ever Book Dispenser @ Choa Chu Kang where patrons can conveniently browse and...
